Describe to me a fantasy scene, in great detail. The scene is of a @LocationType@

I need you to write me a creative and random description of a fantasy guild. Use the following headers (without indenting): Guild Name: [Random guild name] Guild Logo: [Random guild logo or sigil] Guild Motto: [Random motto or slogan] Guild Strength: @Strength@ (Instruction: remember this when generating the below responses. The strength should be reflected in all other elements) Guild Alignment: @Alignment@ (Instruction: remember this when generating the below responses.
Description: [Write a concise overview of the guild’s purpose and reputation. Weak guilds may be small, obscure, or struggling, while strong guilds should have widespread influence, recognition, and notable achievements.]
Allies: [List two allies. For weak guilds, allies may also be modest or unreliable. For strong guilds, allies should be powerful and well-established.] Enemies: [List two enemies. Weak guilds may face local or minor threats, while strong guilds should contend with significant, formidable foes.] Rivals: [Include one rival. For weak guilds, rivals may be similarly small-scale competitors, while strong guilds should have rivalries with other prominent or ambitious groups.]

Generate a random @QuestLevel@ dungeons and dragons style quest hook and resolution

Describe a dungeons and dragons quest quest. Do not change the headers if they are already provided to you. Use them for context.
The quest is @QuestLevel@. The quest should start in a @LocationType@. The theme used is @QuestTheme@.
If Quest Level is Low: Enemies must be mundane. NPCs should be local figures. The quest must NOT involve major political figures, legendary items, or existential threats.
If Quest Level is Medium Low: The threat must be a minor faction, rogue mages, or regional conflict. The quest must NOT include global conspiracies, powerful dragons, or extra-planar enemies.
If Quest Level is Medium: The quest can feature mid-tier monsters, necromancers, and rogue noble factions. The quest must NOT involve ancient evils, archdemons, or deific intervention.
If Quest Level is Medium High: The enemies may include powerful undead, legendary monsters, or archmages. The quest must NOT feature full-fledged gods or universe-ending threats.
If Quest Level is High: Enemies may include demon lords, lesser deities, or extra-planar invasions. The quest must NOT involve multiverse-scale threats or the direct intervention of gods.
If Quest Level is Extreme: Enemies may include rogue gods, cosmic horrors, or beings that threaten all existence. The quest must NOT be limited to simple factional conflicts or material-plane concerns.
